mapper.insert: insert into DEALS_BOARD (title, content, books_category_id, isbn, price,email) values (#{title},#{content},#{booksCategoryId},#{isbn},#{price},#{email})
mapper.select: select * from DEALS_BOARD where deal_id=#{dealId} and disabled='N'
mapper.update: update DEALS_BOARD set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, books_category_id=#{booksCategoryId}, isbn=#{isbn}, price=#{price}, updated_datetime=now(), status=#{status} where deal_id=#{dealId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from DEALS_BOARD d join BOOKS_INFO b on d.isbn = b.isbn
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAVORITES_DEALS (email, deal_id, disabled) VALUES (#{email}, #{dealId}, 'N') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE disabled = IF(disabled = 'N', 'Y', 'N'), favorite_datetime = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT DEAL.* FROM DEALS_BOARD d JOIN FAVORITES_DEALS fd ON d.deal_id = fd.deal_id WHERE fd.email = #{email} AND fd.disabled = 'N' ORDER BY fd.favorite_datetime DESC limit #{skip}, #{size}
select count(*) FROM DEALS_BOARD d JOIN FAVORITES_DEALS fd ON d.deal_id = fd.deal_id WHERE fd.email = #{email} AND fd.disabled = 'N'
